{"step_by_step_thinking": "Stress breakers are used in partial denture construction to distribute the forces applied to the denture to the supporting structures. The cost of stress breakers (option A) is not a reason to avoid their use. They do not increase the vertical dimension (option B). While they may be somewhat more complex to design and fabricate (option C), this is not a reason to avoid their use. The main concern with stress breakers is their potential harmful effect on the abutment (option D), as they can cause undue stress and potential damage.", "answer_choice": "D"}
